explanation: There are several bullish and buy-oriented signals in the opinions. Multiple users mention key support levels around 106,600-106,800 and anticipate upward movement from there. Some highlight consolidation and bullish structure on higher timeframes (4hr, 1min MA, support holding), and mention recent missed 'rocket' moves. However, the presence of sideways and choppy market comments, as well as warnings about big fluctuations and manipulation, add some caution, making overall confidence medium. Many requests for BTC entry and FOMO also signal positive sentiment but not extreme conviction.
